products.title: Berkley Ebony
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure berkley ebony standard roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality standard roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 200mm max width: 1800mm
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 3000mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	tube: robust aluminium tube
 	control: sidewinder or spring control
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
